settings.hero_text: We help Entrepreneurs build Shopify Stores with Shopify Store development & E-commerce Strategies

settings.heading_title: Transform your Shopify Store into Profit and create Value
settings.description: As Shopify Store developers, it’s our mission to help you create an impact on a global scale — by turning your products & services into inspiration across communities & beyond.

settings.title: Ready to dive in?
settings.subtitle: Find out more about our plans

settings.projects_subheading: Learn how to grow your business with our expert advice.

settings.feature_description: We create and tailor your theme to ensure its success.
We will find the perfect logistics solution for you.
We offer our knowledge to help you succeed in your industry.
We help you setup your feeds in different channels
We provide support for your local and physical needs, offering expertise in hardware and software.
Do you need an additional feature or a custom tool? We can build it specifically for you.
We assist you in discovering and setting up external resources that enhance the potential of your business.
We can maintain your store to high standards and analyze trends to identify potential opportunities or unusual occurrences.

settings.title: All-in-one platform
settings.subtitle: What we do
settings.description: With over 10 years of business management and Web Development & design experience, we like to say that we bring color to your business & work strategically to align you as the leader you deserve to be.

settings.timeline_description: Complete the form that we have designed to answer the most common questions and schedule a free call. This way we can get to know you an your business and help you as quickly as possible.
After our discovery call, we will gather all the information, process it and build a project plan according to your business needs. We will send you an estimate
After accepting our proposal, you will be welcome with your own client portal where you will be able to follow up updates, sign up documentation, upload content and schedule calls with the team.
We will help you maintain your store by providing step-by-step guidance. If necessary, we can also suggest a maintenance plan to keep your store thriving and growing

settings.title: Membership levels
settings.description: Choose the plan that works for you
settings.call_description: Any questions? Flexible payment plan. Pause or cancel anytime.

settings.question: Who are the developers
settings.answer: At Outerpreneur, You can expect a personalized touch from start to finish. As the Founder of Outerpreneur, Alek, I take pride in personally handling a significant amount of task, using extensive experience in the Shopify space. Additionally, I collaborate with a select group of talented colleagues who bring their extensive expertise in specific areas, ensuring exceptional results for your Project

settings.question: Where are you based?
settings.answer: We are headquartered in Geneva, which is located in Switzerland, right by the beautiful Lake Lehmann. Our business operations extend globally, collaborating with companies from various countries such as Switzerland, Germany, Spain, France, Panama, Costa Rica, the United States, the Netherlands, Singapore, and many others around the world. Our reach knows no bounds as we work with partners from diverse regions on a global scale.

settings.question: What are you standards
settings.answer: Every single one of our team members is dedicated to providing you with outstanding work. We place immense importance on ensuring that the work we deliver is of the highest quality. Our ultimate goal is to bring a smile of satisfaction to your face. Your happiness is what drives us, and we will always go above and beyond to exceed your expectations. Rest assured that we will leave no stone unturned in our pursuit of excellence. Your satisfaction is at the forefront of everything we do.

settings.question: What types of projects do you accept?
settings.answer: We are fully capable of providing a range of services to meet your needs. Our offerings include the option to create new stores from the ground up, migrate existing stores, provide consulting services, and make custom code modifications tailored to your specific requirements. Whether you're starting from scratch or looking to enhance your current store, we have the expertise to assist you every step of the way.

settings.question: How do you communicate.
settings.answer: We will create a dedicated client portal exclusively for you. This portal will serve as a central hub where you can conveniently track the progress of your project and stay in touch with us. To facilitate smooth communication, we employ a combination of email, Notion, and weekly Google meet calls. Through these channels, we ensure that you are well-informed about the status of your project and provide you with a platform to convey your thoughts and feedback.

settings.question: What technology stack do you utilize for website development?
settings.answer: We create themes using a variety of technologies. These include Liquid, Vanilla Javascript, CSS, React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. In order to aid our development process, we utilize numerous libraries, frameworks, and open source tools. Our aim is to ensure our themes are built efficiently and effectively, employing a range of resources available to us.

settings.title: We Guide You With Expertise
settings.description: We work closely with a carefully select suite of e‑commerce technologies, platforms, and specialists; all designed to maximize performance across our Shopify stores.

settings.testimonials_subtitle: We have worked with amazing entrepreneurs
settings.testimonials_text_1: I am very pleased with the quality of work Outerpreneur has delivered for us. They were highly engaged, possessed excellent communication skills, and provided timely delivery of materials. Moreover, they exceeded our expectations by offering valuable recommendations.
settings.author_handle_1: CEO of Nativus Hom & Marilou Shop
settings.testimonials_text_2: “It was a pleasure to work with Alek. He is very proactive, offers reasonable solutions and delivers flawless work and is always on time. Our project included work on the platforms Shopify and Printful. Alek is not only familiar with the web design, but also gave very good and helpful advice about settings and policies of the mentioned platforms. I would work with Alek again anytime.”
settings.testimonials_text_3: “Alek did a great job putting my website up to date and converting my Shopify store to 2.0. He also re-designed my website and layout. He also offers ongoing Shopify POS support which is greatly helpful and appreciated. I will keep using his services in a near future.”
settings.testimonials_text_4: “I have worked with Aleksander on various projects and really appreciate his work as well as his way of working. Also, his communication is very clear and he works very precisely. Aleksander has a lot of knowledge in e-commerce as well as with Shopify and is always interested in innovations and researches and implements the most reasonable solution. I look forward to many more projects together."
settings.testimonials_text_5: “I had the pleasure of collaborating withAlek on several e-commerce projects, and I have consistently been impressed by his exceptional skills and dedication.  What sets Alek apart is his commitment to delivering quality work on time and within budget. He is a reliable and proactive professional who takes ownership of their tasks and consistently delivers outstanding results. I have always been impressed by his ability to troubleshoot and find creative solutions to complex technical challenges.  If you're looking for a professional who combines technical expertise with a passion for delivering exceptional results, Alek is the ideal choice!”
settings.testimonials_text_6:
"I have the pleasure of an ongoing collaboration with Alek for my Shopify platform (three physical stores and a webshop).
He goes to great lengths to understand my companies needs and to come with appropriate solutions.
He consistently delivers excellent results and his communication skills are great. He responds swiftly to inquiries, provides clear updates on progress, and is always open to discussing any questions or concerns that arise."

settings.caption: We are excited about innovative ideas that evolve into successful businesses. I would be delighted to assist you on your e-commerce journey and help you achieve your desired goals by enhancing your brand.
settings.hero_2_title: On a mission to Empower Entrepreneurs
settings.description_1: We aim to support entrepreneurs in bringing their ideas to life through programming, logistics, and strategic thinking.
settings.description_2: By supporting and fostering the growth of Shopify, we aim to offer assistance and resources that will greatly contribute to the success of your business venture. Our goal is to provide you with the necessary tools, guidance, and support to help your business flourish and thrive in the marketplace.
settings.description_3: With our commitment to nurturing Shopify, we are dedicated to ensuring that you have every opportunity and advantage to achieve your business objectives and cultivate long-term success.
